metadata.title: CVE-2021-47485 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: IB/qib:Protect from buffer overflow in struct qib_user_sdma_pkt fields Overflowingeither addrlimit or bytes_togo can allow userspace to trigger a bufferoverflow of kernel memory. Check for overflows in all the places doing mathon user controlled buffers.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
